law.catch_line: // EFFECTIVE UNTIL JUNE 30, 2013 PER CHAPTER 467 OF 2012 //...
law.text:
// EFFECTIVE UNTIL JUNE 30, 2013 PER CHAPTER 467 OF 2012 //
wages paid to a qualified employee with a disability; and
child care provided or paid for by a business entity for the children of a qualified employee with a disability as provided under § 21-309 of the Education Article; or
transportation provided or paid for by the business entity for a qualified employee with a disability as provided under § 21-309 of the Education Article.
